title: The Challenge
creator_credit: British Information Services and Rentokil Film Unit
brief_description: Describes the history of the origin of the rat. Discusses the methods used to avoid rat infestation, whilst also describing the rats’ habits, and habitation. Essentially a propaganda film for the company Rentokil.
